sentences.en: A vacancy has occurred in my office.
All the same, I'll let you know if there is a vacancy coming up.
sentences.cn: 不过要是有了空缺, 我就通知你.

sentences.en: Clara saw the vacancy of her expression gradually filling with woefulness.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉看到她空洞的表情中渐渐充满了悲痛.
我知道也许我们不得不在边界等着.

sentences.en: I rang the Colonel and asked him to put my name forward for the vacancy in Zurich.
sentences.cn: 我给上校打电话请他推荐我去填补苏黎世的那个职位空缺。

sentences.en: Is the job / vacancy / position still open ( ie available, unfilled )?
sentences.cn: 那工作[空缺/位置]还接受申请 吗 ?

sentences.en: Is the teaching vacancy still open?
sentences.cn: 教员职位还有空缺 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lucy is the best person to fill this secretary vacancy.
sentences.cn: 露西是秘书这个空缺的最佳人选.

sentences.en: Mr. A has been named for the vacancy.
The council is making every effort to fill the vacancies.
sentences.cn: 地方议会正想方设法填补这些职缺。

sentences.en: The vacancy of her expression made me doubt if she was listening.
sentences.cn: 她茫然的神情让我怀疑她是否在听.

sentences.en: The vacancy of his expression made me doubt if he was listening.
sentences.cn: 他那失神的样子使我怀疑他是否在听.

sentences.en: There are still two vacancies on the school board.
sentences.cn: 学校董事会还有两个职位空缺。

sentences.en: They have a vacancy for a secretary.
This will help to fill a vacancy in our knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这有助于弥补我们知识上的空白.

sentences.en: We noticed a look of vacancy on his face.
sentences.cn: 我们觉查到他脸上有一种茫然若失的神情.

words.tran_cn: 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的
空白,空虚,空隙,空间,裂缝,裂口,孔洞

phrases.tran_cn: 空置率，闲置率；职位空缺比率

trans.tran_en: a job that is available for someone to start doing
